name: abstractgo
description: An AI/ML solution for medical investigation classification based on title and abstracts.

scripts.build: npm -w client run build:from_root && npm -w server run build && npm -w mcp-server run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm -w mcp-server run api:install && npm -w server run api:install && npm -w client install
scripts.clean: npm -w server run clean && npm -w client run clean && npm -w mcp-server run clean && rm -rf node_modules

author: Carlos J. Ramirez, Iver Johan Incapie, Alejandro Arroyave Perez
